reviewText: A wonderful and encouraging program for kids. My 7, 5 and 2 year old all just love it. So happy to have found some more episodes.
We love this DVD!  Thank you Jesus for the God rocks! and for the ministry they provide to children in teaching God's Word!

I bought this DVD a few months ago and I am happy that I did.  My 5 year old daughter loves the DVD especially the music.  The fact that she is learning about GOD in a fun way is really awesome.  It keeps her interest all the time.

We purchased this for my 2 1/2 year old daughter.  Perfect! its got fun stories and songs that keep her engages and dancing around the living room.  I have even benefited from watching! The bible verses being sung make it SOOOOO easy to remember them!  Since we live in a world where the programing on TV these days is sooooooo NOT kid friendly and God honoring, this is the perfect thing to have on hand so they are being fed the WORD.

This series is very educational and helps children of all ages get to know the messages from the Bible!  The music and characters are very entertaining, but the messages are very serious.  I would recommend this to anyone!
Not too cheesy over the top, and has just enough edge to keep my 11 yr old interested. Cute songs, likeable characters, great messages.
